title: New blue summoner icon
body: Hey does anyone know what the new blue summoner icon from riot is for ? i got it as a mystery gift after i got my seasonal new rank icon. It is a blue hammer looking weapon in someones hands. I really like the icon but just want to know what it is for

replies.body: By new and blue, I'm guessing you're referring to the alpha tester icon.  Per the [6.23 patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-623-notes#patch-lcu), this was given to players who helped test during the alpha.  Grats!
Thank you sorry for the late response and i was a alpha tester which makes sense about the icon thank you for the information :)
As far as I know, you'll get this if you were Alpha or Beta tester of the new client...
Thank you that makes sense appreciate the help:)
